mapper.insert: insert into T_WEATHER (SZSF, JCDBH, ZDMC, ZDZB, SCSJ, ZDQW, PJQW, ZGQW, JYL, ZDQY, PJQY, ZGQY, HPMQY, PJFS, ZDFS, JDFS, ZDFSFX, JDFSFX, ZXXDSD, PJXDSD, SQY) values (#{szsf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jcdbh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{zdmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zdzb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zdqw,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pjqw,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{zgqw,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{jyl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{zdqy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pjqy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{zgqy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{hpmqy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pjfs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{zdfs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{jdfs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{zdfsfx,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{jdfsfx,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{zxxdsd,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pjxdsd,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sqy,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.select: select SZSF, JCDBH, ZDMC, ZDZB, SCSJ, ZDQW, PJQW, ZGQW, JYL, ZDQY, PJQY, ZGQY, HPMQY, PJFS, ZDFS, JDFS, ZDFSFX, JDFSFX, ZXXDSD, PJXDSD, SQY from T_WEATHER
